hints.label: obs-temporal-coherence
hints.title: Temporal Coherence of Walker Configurations
hints.content:
36: :label: obs-temporal-coherence
37: 
38: For small timestep Δt, the walker configuration exhibits strong temporal coherence:
39: 
40: 1. **Most walkers move locally**: Approximately N(1 - p_clone) walkers evolve via the SDE, moving a small distance ~v·Δt
41: 2. **Few walkers teleport**: Only ~N·p_clone walkers are involved in cloning events (non-local jumps)
42: 3. **Small perturbation**: The Delaunay triangulation DT(t+Δt) is a small perturbation of DT(t)
hints.raw_directive:
33: The walker configuration between timesteps t and t+Δt is **highly correlated**:
34: 
35: :::{prf:observation} Temporal Coherence of Walker Configurations
36: :label: obs-temporal-coherence
37: 
38: For small timestep Δt, the walker configuration exhibits strong temporal coherence:
39: 
40: 1. **Most walkers move locally**: Approximately N(1 - p_clone) walkers evolve via the SDE, moving a small distance ~v·Δt
41: 2. **Few walkers teleport**: Only ~N·p_clone walkers are involved in cloning events (non-local jumps)
42: 3. **Small perturbation**: The Delaunay triangulation DT(t+Δt) is a small perturbation of DT(t)
43:
